other_tests.findings: 4 mm oblong pulmonary nodule (stable since previous imaging), mild ground-glass opacities in the right lower lobe (likely atelectasis), heart mildly enlarged, rim enhancing lesion near gallbladder fossa measuring 1.9 x 1.6 cm (previously not imaged), 2.6 cm cyst in hepatic segment 7 (unchanged), diverticulosis of the sigmoid colon, thickening of the sigmoid colon with stranding around inflamed diverticula (possible perforated diverticulum), fibroid uterus with multiple fibroids, and mild atherosclerotic disease.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Pulmonary nodule stable, hepatic cyst unchanged, multiple subcentimeter hypodensities in the liver overall similar to prior exams. The rim enhancing lesion near gallbladder was previously not imaged. Other changes not specified.
